name: AVCaptureDevice.FocusMode
desc: Constants to specify the focus mode of a capture device.

items.name: case locked
items.desc: The device has its focus locked.

items.name: case autoFocus
items.desc: The device automatically adjusts the focus once and then changes the focus mode to AVCaptureDevice.FocusMode.locked.

items.name: case continuousAutoFocus
items.desc: The device continuously monitors focus and autofocuses when necessary.
